articles.title: DPRK Embassy Inaugurated in Minsk
articles.content:
DPRK Embassy Inaugurated in Minsk
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Embassy was inaugurated with due ceremony in Minsk on September 19.
					 Present there on invitation were personages of the government, political parties, parliament and social circles of Belarus.
					
					 Officials of the DPRK Foreign Ministry and several units staying in Belarus took part in the ceremony.
					
					 A department director of the Foreign Ministry of Belarus said the inauguration of the DPRK Embassy is of great significance in boosting the long-standing friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries, expressing the belief that the bilateral relations will grow stronger in all fields.
					
					 The director wished the Korean people bigger successes in the work for social and economic development of the country.
					
					 The flag of the DPRK was hoisted at the embassy.

articles.title: DPRK FM Department Director Visits Belarus
articles.content:
DPRK FM Department Director Visits Belarus
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- A working-level delegation of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK headed by its department director     visited the Republic of Belarus from September 18 to 20 at the invitation of its Foreign Ministry.
					 During the visit the delegation held negotiations with a department director of the FM of Belarus and attended an inaugural ceremony of the DPRK Embassy in Minsk.
					
					 At the negotiations both sides discussed the issues of boosting the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation in the political, economic, cultural and various other fields and exchanged views on the regional and international issues of mutual concern.
					
					 Both sides reaffirmed the will to boost the long-standing bilateral friendly relations onto a new stage in conformity with the wishes and interests of the peoples of the two countries and reached a consensus of views on steadily developing political relations including exchange between the two foreign ministries and boosting the bilateral economic cooperation in line with it.
					
					 The Belarusian side appreciated the opening of the DPRK Embassy in Minsk as an expression of the aspiration and will of the government and people of the DPRK to develop the bilateral relations onto a new stage.
					
					 The DPRK side expressed thanks to the government, the Foreign Ministry and relevant organs of Belarus for providing selfless help and conveniences to the work for opening the embassy.
					
					 Both sides expressed the willingness to have closer mutual cooperation in the UN and other international arena on the principles of non-interference in internal affairs, respect for sovereignty, equality and mutual benefits.

articles.title: Greetings to Malian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Malian President
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on September 16 sent a message of greeting to Ibrahim Boubacar Keita, president of the Republic of Mali, on the 56th anniversary of the proclamation of the Republic.
					 The president in the message expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries with a long history and tradition would grow stronger and wished the Malian president and people successes in the work for accomplishing peace, stability and socio-economic development of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Armenian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Armenian President
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Serge Sarkissian, president of the Republic of Armenia, on Wednesday on its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the president of Armenia good health and greater successes in his work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: New Births Witnessed in Disaster Areas of DPRK
articles.content:
New Births Witnessed in Disaster Areas of DPRK
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Five babies were born in Hoeryong City, one of the flood-hit areas in northern part of the DPRK.
					 When the flooding severely hit the city, displacing many citizens, there were some parturient women among them.
					
					 City officials, citizens and medical workers turned out to rescue and carry those women to the Hoeryong Maternity Hospital and showed all sincerity to them under such critical situation caused by disaster.
					
					 Kang Chun Sim, a woman residing in Mangyang-dong, Hoeryong City who was the first to give birth in the flood-stricken areas, told KCNA:
					
					 I didn't expect that I would have an easy delivery in this disaster area.
					
					 Many officials and builders have showed warm congratulations and deep care for me, an ordinary citizen, though they are busy with the recovery efforts.
					
					 This grateful scene can be seen only in our socialist system, I dare say.

articles.title: Participants in Film Festival Enjoy Friendly Amusement Games
articles.content:
Participants in Film Festival Enjoy Friendly Amusement Games
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- There took place friendly amusement games of the participants in the 15th Pyongyang International Film Festival at the Taesongsan Pleasure Park on Wednesday.
					 They were divided into Red team and Blue team. They competed in diverse amusement games.
					
					 They fully demonstrated their wisdom and skills in the events.
					
					 The spectators warmly cheered the players, revving up the atmosphere.

articles.title: Korean Stamp Show Opens
articles.content:
Korean Stamp Show Opens
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The Korean stamp show for marking the 70th anniversary of Kim Il Sung University opened at the university Wednesday.
					 Displayed in the venue of the show is a stamp carrying the photo of portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 On display there are stamps dealing with the revolutionary history of the President who liberated the country through the anti-Japanese armed struggle and led to the victory the building of new democratic Korea, the Fatherland Liberation War and socialist construction.
					
					 Also displayed there are stamps reflecting the history of the love shown by the President who founded the university, the first one of the people, and made efforts for the development of the university.
					
					 The stamps deal with revolutionary career and immortal feats of Kim Jong Il who turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power and invincible military power since he started his activities at the university. 
					
					 Stamps "Apartment houses for educators of Kim Il Sung University", "Sci-Tech Complex", "Mirae Scientists Street", "People's Theatre", etc. reflect the shining reality of the DPRK in which the epoch-making changes are witnessed in the construction of building a powerful socialist country. 
					
					 Stamps show the heroic struggle of the army and people of the DPRK who have performed miracles and feats in defending the country and building socialism
					
					 Displayed there are also varieties of stamps presented by philatelists here.
					
					 The show goes on until October 2.

articles.title: National University Students Sports Contest Opens
articles.content:
National University Students Sports Contest Opens
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- A national university students sports contest for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of Kim Il Sung University opened at the Stadium of the university Wednesday. 
					 It brought together more than 690 players selected from universities across the country including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology and Pyongyang University of Architecture. They will compete in basketball, volleyball, table tennis, handball and swimming events.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were officials, teachers and students of relevant fields and various universities.
					
					 Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education, made an opening address.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, there took place basketball, volleyball and table tennis matches.
					
					 The contest goes on until Sept. 27.

articles.title: Railway Reconstruction Progresses Apace in Flood-hit Areas
articles.content:
Railway Reconstruction Progresses Apace in Flood-hit Areas
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The railway reconstruction is making headway in the flood-hit areas of North Hamgyong Province, the DPRK.
					 According to Won Sung Ho, head of a department of the Ministry of Railways, landslide removal has been carried out at 65 percent and the restoration of subgrade and mast at 70 and 35 percents respectively until now, reopening some railway sections to traffic.
					
					 The recent disaster in the country's northern part destroyed railroads of several hundred kilometers, including Namyang-Hakpho and Sophungsan-Musan railway sections.
					
					 Many units under the ministry turned out in an all-out work to finish the rehabilitation of damaged railways in the disaster areas at an early date.

articles.title: Poster "Wonsan Air Festival-2016" Produced
articles.content:
Poster "Wonsan Air Festival-2016" Produced
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- A poster was produced ahead of the Wonsan Air Festival-2016.
					 There are letters in upper part of the poster "WELCOME" showing friendly feelings of the Korean people towards foreign friends coming to the festival from different parts of the world and the logo of the festival with Kalma Airport which was remodeled as a monumental building in the Songun era for background.
					
					 Depicted there are planes showing brave and gifted skills in clear and blue sky.
					
					 The venue and period of the festival are given in the lower part of the poster.

articles.title: Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Performance in Chongjin
articles.content:
Wangjaesan Art Troupe Gives Performance in Chongjin
Chongjin, September 21 (KCNA) -- The Wangjaesan Art Troup started its performance tour of Chongjin, North Hamgyong Province from September 21.
					 Among the audience were people of different circles and officials in the province.
					
					 The performance began with music "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu". Put on the stage were songs, dances, instrumental music and other colorful numbers.
					
					 When female solo and pangchang immortal famous work "Where Are You, Dear General?" was put on the stage, the audience were full of boundless yearning for leader Kim Jong Il who unfolded a new history of changes by leaving inerasable footprints for guidance in every part of the province.
					
					 In female chorus "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un", female duet "His Humanity" and other numbers the artistes impressively depicted the thinking and feelings of the army and people of the DPRK to remain true to the loving care for the people shown by Marshal Kim Jong Un while working heart and soul to provide the afflicted-people with warm cradles as early as possible.
					
					 In dance "Just Give Us Your Order" they truthfully represented the revolutionary faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to shatter the moves of the U.S. imperialists for invading it and build a dignified and prospering reunified power on this land without fail.

articles.title: Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Metal Industry Held
articles.content:
Scientific and Technological Presentation in Field of Metal Industry Held
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- A national scientific and technological presentation in the field of metal industry took place at the Grand People's Study House on Tuesday and Wednesday under the sponsorship of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Science and Technology of Korea.
					 Present there were scientists, technicians, teachers and postgraduate students of the Ferrous Metal Research Institute and the Mechanical Engineering Institute of the State Academy of Sciences, Kim Chaek University of Technology and other units.
					
					 The presentation was held, divided into metallurgical and material panels.
					
					 It heard more than 60 papers on achievements and experience made in the course of increasing the production of steel and iron, improving the quality of metal goods and putting the production processes on a modern and CNC basis.
					
					 There took place a lecture on the recent trend of development of metal industry.

articles.title: 11th Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics Held
articles.content:
11th Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics Held
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The 11th Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics took place in the Central Youth Hall on Wednesday.
					 Present there were Vice-Premier Kim Tok Hun, officials concerned, officials, architects, technicians, teachers, researchers and creators in the fields of construction designing, construction, supervision, building materials production and scientific and educational institutions.
					
					 Speeches were made by Choe Hae Sok, vice-minister of State Construction Control, Pak Kwang Su, director of the Paektusan Architectural Institute, and others.
					
					 Speakers scientifically and theoretically explained the feats Marshal Kim Jong Un has performed by adding to the great heyday of construction last year and the fact that grand monumental structures have been built under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea and the issues arising in creating Korean-style architectures.
					
					 They deeply explained about a powerful demonstration of the vitality of the Party's theory of architecture including the issues of thoroughly applying the Juche character and national identity, originality and convenience in building monumental architectures.
					
					 They underlined the need to give steady continuity to the great heyday of construction and make a proactive contribution to building a socialist power.

articles.title: National Symposium to Mark 70th Anniversary of Kim Il Sung University Held
articles.content:
National Symposium to Mark 70th Anniversary of Kim Il Sung University Held
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- A national symposium of different sectors to mark the 70th founding anniversary of Kim Il Sung University took place at the university on Monday and Tuesday.
					 Present at the symposium were Choe Sang Gon, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea; Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission; Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education; and officials, teachers and researchers of at least 80 scientific and educational institutions including Kim Il Sung University, the State Academy of Sciences, the Academy of Social Sciences and Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					
					 The symposium was divided into more than 60 panels. It heard more than one thousand papers on social sciences which explained the personality of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un as the peerlessly great men and their undying leadership exploits and papers on natural sciences conducive to building of a scientific and technological power.
					
					 Speakers said that Kim Jong Il worked heart and soul to develop Kim Il Sung University into the center for training revolutionary talents, a seat of training reliable backbones for the Songun revolution.
					
					 They called for further glorifying the history and tradition of the university which has covered a proud course of development thanks to the particular love and trust of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu in the struggle to embody Kim Jong Un's idea of building a socialist power.

articles.title: Kwangpho Duck Farm
articles.content:
Kwangpho Duck Farm
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Among the new natural monuments designated by the DPRK in recent years is a new species of duck President Kim Il Sung personally named "Kwangpho".
					 This duck is now raised on the Kwangpho Duck Farm in Jongphyong County of South Hamgyong Province.
					
					 The history of the farm tells about the peerlessly great persons' warm love for the people.
					
					 The construction of the farm began on a Cabinet decision adopted under the care of Kim Il Sung in June 1951 when the Fatherland Liberation War was at its height. And the farm came into being five days after the ceasefire on July 27, 1953.
					
					 The President inspected the farm in October 1953, stressing that the Party and the state should solve the meat problem in a responsible manner to provide all the people with enough meat.
					
					 When the farm was in a crisis with group deaths of duck from unexpected reason, he again visited it to indicate the ways for its conservation and took a step to get hatchery duck eggs from abroad. 
					
					 Later, he taught how to quickly rear duck and process its meat and sent sample of duck eggs salted by him at his residence, showing deep care for the improvement of people's diet
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il visited the farm in May 1974 and on other occasions to encourage its employees to boost the production. In November 2000 when he gave field guidance to South Hamgyong Province, he indicated the orientation for updating the farm.
					
					 Thanks to the energetic efforts and guidance of the great leaders, the Kwangpho Duck Farm turned into a modern poultry producer whose all processes are automated.
					
					 Now it makes great contribution to the improvement of people's diet under the loving care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Achievements Made by Three-revolution Team Members in DPRK
articles.content:
Achievements Made by Three-revolution Team Members in DPRK
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The three-revolution team members active in different parts of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have solved a lot of sci-tech problems conducive to ensuring the home production of raw materials, fuel and equipment.
					 The members at the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex laid a sci-tech guarantee for ensuring the production with locally-available raw materials and introduced various technical innovation plans to vitalize the production.
					
					 Those at the Chollima Steel Complex manufactured a new equipment part higher in performance and longer in serviceable life than imported one, while the members of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex made a Korean-style hollow steel.
					
					 The three-revolution team members active at the Namhung Youth Chemical Complex and the February 8 Vinalon Complex settled technical problems arising in the production of new lubricant based on domestic raw materials and manufactured a new high-performance packing.
					
					 Such significant achievements were also made by members active at other industrial establishments across the country including the Taedonggang Battery Factory and the Pukchang Thermal Power Complex.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Members of Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Letter from Members of Congratulatory Group of Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un Wednesday received a letter from the members of the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for marking the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The days of the DPRK visit offered an opportunity of fortune for witnessing a chapter of the great history of Kim Jong Un's era with boundless joy and emotion and were unforgettable days when we came to know the blessings of the people who are holding the outstanding leader, the letter said, adding:
					
					 The 68th anniversary of the DPRK was a historic occasion that demonstrated to the world the might of the harmonious whole of the country by which all service personnel and people are united close around you with one mind and the might of Songun Korea, the nuclear power in the East and the military power in the world.
					
					 You glorified on the highest ground the founding anniversary of the great Paektusan nation with the nuclear thunder of September that startled the world and recorded the new legend of loving the people and helped service personnel and people make endeavors out of patriotism.
					
					 Under the leadership of you, the greatest man in the world, miraculous victory of recovering from the natural disasters in the northern part of the country will surely be achieved and the great Paektusan nation will prosper forever as the great country of the sun and the paradise of the most blessed people.
					
					 The letter evinced their will to more tangibly contribute to the building of a reunified powerful country of Mt. Paektu and thus and give fuller play to the honor of setting an example of patriotism and loyalty in the great Kim Jong Un's era, an example of the overseas compatriot movement of the world.

articles.title: KCNA on Park Geun Hye Group's Reckless Action Precipitating Its Destruction
articles.content:
KCNA on Park Geun Hye Group's Reckless Action Precipitating Its Destruction
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The Park Geun Hye group have entered all the more undisguised phase in its confrontation with the DPRK.
					 The group of traitors are now spouting such heinous invectives as "determination to bring the north's regime to an end," "scorched-earth operation against the north's supreme leadership" and "making Pyongyang disappear from map."
					
					 This cannot be interpreted otherwise than a frantic action risking their lives.
					
					 This is the last-ditch efforts of those frightened by the daily increasing might of the DPRK.
					
					 In the past, the puppet forces made frantic confrontation while talking about someone's "instability of social system" and "preparations for the era of unification."
					
					 But, they did not openly called for "north's regime change" nor tried to make it its "policy toward the north" as traitor Park Geun Hye does.
					
					 The situation goes to clearly prove that the Park group's confrontation has reached an unpardonable phase.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test slandered by the Park group is a great auspicious event and pride of the nation that demonstrated to the world its existence as a full-fledged nuclear power that has passed the final gate to bolstering up the nuclear force.
					
					 The U.S., which has made desperate efforts to pursue the hostile policy toward the DPRK for decades while consistently posing nuclear blackmail and threat to the DPRK, held its hands up in fear of the might of the DPRK's nuclear weapons. Therefore, it is ridiculous for Park Geun Hye clinging to her master to talk about the "regime change."
					
					 Park, who works hard to hurt the DPRK demonstrating its might as an invincible nuclear power, is a psychopath harboring the daydream of sweeping the sea with a broom.
					
					 With no desperate efforts can the Park group block the DPRK from bolstering nuclear force, and it will be made to admit the great defeat of its racket of putting sanctions and stifling the DPRK before long.
					
					 The Park group's desperate efforts to escalate confrontation with the DPRK would only hasten the "regime change" in south Korea and the group of traitors will be forced to meet a miserable doom.
					
					 Habit is a second nature. The conservative group's endeavor to escalate the confrontation of social systems, not abandoning its bad habit will only prompt the army and people of the DPRK to resolutely punish it in the name of the nation, never pardoning it.
					
					 The Park group should clearly understand that remarks made by its dirty mouths and racket of confrontation with the DPRK would precipitate its miserable destruction.

articles.title: THAAD Deployment Will Bring Great National Disaster Only: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
THAAD Deployment Will Bring Great National Disaster Only: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities frightened by the great explosive power of nuclear warhead of the DPRK are getting ever more frantic in their moves to deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye, in particular, blustered that "THAAD deployment is unavoidable," not content with trumpeting about "an extremely grave situation of state emergency level." 
					
					 Her mandarins are unhesitatingly claiming that "the nuclear test of the north increased the necessity of deploying THAAD" and that "it is necessary to introduce not just one battery but more batteries additionally."
					
					 What they uttered amounts to despicable acts of stooges of the U.S. taking the lead in realizing the U.S. ambition for world domination utterly indifferent to the destiny of the nation and cheap charade to cover up their mean nature.
					
					 The Park regime's frenzy to cope with the nuclear strike of the DPRK with THAAD is as foolish as trying to cover naked body with fallen leaves.
					
					 THAAD and other missile shields of the U.S. are, in fact, nothing but scrap iron as it was formally branded by the U.S. Board of Audit and Inspection in February this year as the flawed means incapable of protecting the U.S.
					
					 A U.S. expert who has studied the missile defense system for more than three decades admitted that the technology shown by north Korea during its satellite launch in February proved that it is capable of making THAAD useless.
					
					 Behaviors of the Park group running amuck, totally depending on THAAD which is ridiculed even in the U.S. only bring to light their despicable true colors as gang of lackeys.
					
					 THAAD deployment is part of the U.S. scenario for world domination from A to Z.
					
					 It is the ulterior intention of the U.S. to hold its military hegemony in the Asia-Pacific region and the rest of the world by fully containing the regional potential rivals by force of arms.
					
					 That is why neighboring countries solemnly warned that the Park group will have to pay a high price for the THAAD deployment as a token of strong opposition to it.
					
					 Park is vociferating that THAAD will protect the south Korean people in contingency but the fact is quite contrary to reality.
					
					 If THAAD is deployed in south Korea, it will be exposed to nuclear strikes here and there as the primary target.
					
					 The THAAD deployment will bring tremendous damage to south Korea as it will have to cover the expenses for operating it with the money collected from the people as taxes as the right to use it is in the hands of the U.S. master.
					
					 It is necessary to make a clean sweep of Park Geun Hye without delay, if the south Korean people are to escape a horrible nuclear disaster.
					
					 All Koreans should never allow the Park group to deploy THAAD in south Korea.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Condemns Japanese Reactionaries for Covering up Its Past Crimes
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Condemns Japanese Reactionaries for Covering up Its Past Crimes
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, Abe told Park Geun Hye to opt for faithfully implementing the "agreement" including the issue of the statue of girl sexual slave as Japan keeps the "agreement on the comfort women".
					 Abe's assertion means that south Korea should remove the statue of girl sexual slave for the Imperial Japanese Army before the Japanese Embassy in Seoul as Japan pays money to the "aid foundation".
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday says:
					
					 This clearly shows that what a reckless phase the impudence and moral vulgarity of the Japanese reactionaries working hard to cover up their heinous crimes against humanity have reached. Japan walked away 200 000 Korean women for sexual slaves.
					
					 The issue of sexual slave is not an issue that can be glossed over by deceiving a simple soul.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should admit the state's legal and moral responsibilities as soon as possible, heartily apologize and make reparation for their crimes and take measures for the reinstatement of all the victims and prevent recurrence.
					
					 It is a requirement of international law and international usage for a state to take the blame for its crimes and make apology and reparation for them.
					
					 The country which does not honor the international legal responsibility and moral duty can never be trusted in by the world.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are seriously mistaken if they think they can liquidate their heinous unethical crimes such as the sexual slavery by paying a petty amount of money to the Park Geun Hye group of traitors.
					
					 They should abandon their nature of skinflint who behaves childishly by showing off purse.

articles.title: Minju Joson Lambastes U.S. Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
Minju Joson Lambastes U.S. Sanctions against DPRK
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Upon hearing the news of the DPRK's successful nuclear warhead explosion test, bosses of the Obama Administration are vying with each other in talking about outworn sanctions against the DPRK, crying out for the adoption of "resolutions" and "tough sanctions".
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday ridicules the U.S. still clinging to sanctions, unaware of how the world changes.
					
					 As all recognize, sanctions and pressure are unworkable on the DPRK, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is now standing at the crossroads of two options--whether it will ruin its own fate by itself while continuing to pursue the policy for confrontation with the DPRK or whether it will prolong its remaining days with prudence and self-restraint.
					
					 The U.S. should clearly understand that there is no limitation to the strength of all the service personnel and people who are firmly rallied around the peerlessly great man of Mt. Paektu in thinking and purpose, morality and sense of obligation, and that when this strength explodes, it will meet grave consequences.
					
					 The U.S. may stake its fate on the incompetent sanctions in standing in confrontation with the DPRK but it will spark off only derision of all people.
					
					 It had better act with reason, abandoning the pipedream at an early date if it does not want to suffer from disgrace and ruin, being ridiculed as modern-day "Don Quixote".

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces Plan to Stage Military Drills for Attacking Major Facilities of DPRK
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces Plan to Stage Military Drills for Attacking Major Facilities of DPRK
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet warmongers are planning to take part in the Red Flag joint military drills, a large-scale aerial war exercises to be staged in Alaska from early October, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 During the period the warmongers are going to stage together with the U.S. Air Force drills for making precision strike at nuclear and other major facilities of the DPRK under various situations with the introduction of fighters and transports.
					
					 It was reported that a drill for containing air force of the opposite side from long distance or supporting the ground force with aerial fire power will be staged.

articles.title: Papers Reveal Park Geun Hye Group's Sinister Intention behind Its Justification of THAAD Deployment
articles.content:
Papers Reveal Park Geun Hye Group's Sinister Intention behind Its Justification of THAAD Deployment
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- DPRK papers Wednesday say that the Park Geun Hye group exasperated by the DPRK's successful nuclear warhead explosion test is working hard to deploy THAAD in south Korea at any cost with the test as a pretext.
					 This is prompted by sinister intention to incite the confrontation with the DPRK within south Korea and rally the conservative forces in a bid to tide over an extreme ruling crisis and inveigle the surrounding countries into the "cooperation to put pressure upon the north", says Rodong Sinmun in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test was part of the practical counteractions to the increased nuclear war threats and unprecedented political and economic sanctions against the DPRK by the U.S. and other hostile forces.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet group have no qualifications to justify themselves under the prevailing situation as they compelled the DPRK to bolster up the nuclear deterrence for self-defence with their frantic moves for nuclear war against the north.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces have given spurs to the THAAD deployment under the pretext of the DPRK's measure to bolster up the nuclear deterrence for self-defence, but nothing will change in their fate.
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary discloses that the Park group's attempt to deploy THAAD at any cost with its deceptive rhetoric of "nuclear threat from the north" is related to its sinister intention to prolong its remaining days by offering the nation as a victim for nuclear confrontation among powers.
					
					 The Park group's desperate efforts to deploy THAAD would force it to face merciless punishment of the Korean revolutionary armed forces, and precipitate its miserable doom, the commentary says, adding: Therefore, it should behave with discretion.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Group Accused of Trying to Adopt UN "Resolution of New Sanctions" against DPRK
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Group Accused of Trying to Adopt UN "Resolution of New Sanctions" against DPRK
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet authorities are running amuck to cook up a UN "resolution of new sanctions" against the DPRK over its nuclear warhead explosion test.
					 Traitor Park Geun Hye recently convened a "state council meeting" at which she said "nuclear threat is coming from the north" and cried out for "way of new sanctions" and "effective counteraction."
					
					 Pressed by the urge of Chongwadae witch Park, her lackeys are busy begging foreign forces for "adoption of a tough and rapid resolution". Meanwhile, the south Korean puppet authorities held a "consultation for counteraction to nuclear threat from the north" with the U.S. and agreed on cooperation for "new sanctions against the north".
					
					 These are desperate efforts of the vanquished frightened by the strong and brave might of the DPRK, and foolish actions aimed to realize the ambition for stifling the fellow countrymen in the north with the backing of outside forces, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is a ridiculous political caricature that the Park group of traitors are vociferating about bringing down the DPRK with hope still pinned on sanctions racket with the backing of the U.S. master.
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, neither sanctions nor pressure will work on the DPRK.
					
					 Though the Park group of traitors are making desperate efforts in collusion with the U.S. and other foreign forces to cook up a UN "resolution of new sanctions" against the DPRK, they can never block its vigorous advance.
					
					 The more the enemies make vicious attempts, the more the DPRK's nuclear deterrence and self-development power will increase.
					
					 The enemies' reckless provocations will precipitate their final ruin only.

articles.title: Zika Virus-Infected Cases Occur in S. Korea
articles.content:
Zika Virus-Infected Cases Occur in S. Korea
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The number of those infected with Zika virus is increasing in south Korea, according to MBC of south Korea on September 18.
					 The result of examination of a man in his twenties who toured a foreign country from Sept. 2 to 13 confirmed that he was infected with Zika virus.
					
					 It is the 13th case since the first case in Kwangyang City, South Jolla Province in March this year.

articles.title: Court Decision Demands S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Reparation for Massacres during Korean War
articles.content:
Court Decision Demands S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Reparation for Massacres during Korean War
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Supreme Court ruled that the "government" should make reparation to the bereaved families of the victims for the massacres committed in Taegu and North Kyongsang Province during the Korean War, according to CBS of south Korea.
					 In July 1950 the south Korean puppet army and police bestially massacred innocent civilians in Taegu and North Kyongsang Province, prisoners in the Taegu Prison, those related to the case of the Association of the Protected and many other people.
					
					 According to the result of investigation made by the south Korean Committee for Settling the Past History for Truth and Reconciliation in 2007, bodies of those who were ruthlessly killed and their relics, bullet cartridges and lethal weapons used by the puppet forces to massacre people were discovered at a dead pit of the cobalt mine in Kyongsan, North Kyongsang Province.

articles.title: South Korean Media Demands Detention of Lee Myung Bak on Corruption Charges
articles.content:
South Korean Media Demands Detention of Lee Myung Bak on Corruption Charges
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Minjok Ilbo carried an editorial calling for detention of traitor Lee Myung Bak, kingpin of corruption and irregularities.
					 There is a claim that Lee embezzled at least 189 trillion won out of the taxes collected, the editorial said.
					
					 During his office, he wasted taxes collected from people and made the mess of the state administration through corruption and irregularities of all description, it held.

articles.title: Chilean Personage Appeals to World Progressives to Give Emergency Aid to Northern Part of DPRK Affected by Flood
articles.content:
Chilean Personage Appeals to World Progressives to Give Emergency Aid to Northern Part of DPRK Affected by Flood
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The representative of the Chilean Branch of the Korean Friendship Association appealed to the world's progressive organizations and people to render emergency aid to the northern part of North Hamgyong Province, the DPRK affected by flood.
					 He, in an article posted on the website of the Branch on Sept. 13, appealed to the world's progressive bodies and people including the organizations and personages of Latin America and Europe to give emergency aid to the residents on the bank of the River Tuman in the northern part of the country who were hit by the biggest disaster since the liberation of the country.
					
					 Thanks to the sincere support of the whole country, a vigorous campaign is in progress to recover from the flood damage in order to alleviate the suffering of the flood victims left homeless at an earliest date, he said, adding that to give positive support to them is a token of the cooperation and solidarity with the people of other country and part of the work to provide against the various potential natural disasters in their countries.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Tunisia
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Tunisia
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- A Tunisian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated.
					 Jalilla el Fersi, secretary general of the Tunisia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events praising the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to Seventh Congress of WPK Posted on Internet by Peruvian Body
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to Seventh Congress of WPK Posted on Internet by Peruvian Body
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- "3. For the Independent Reunification of the Country" of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's Report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the Work of the Central Committee was posted by the Peru-Korea Institute of Culture and Friendship on its website on September 6 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.

articles.title: Lectures Given in Finland, Guinea on DPRK Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Lectures Given in Finland, Guinea on DPRK Founding Anniversary
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Lectures were delivered in Helsinki of Finland, Conakry of Guinea and at the Guinean Guyco Company from Sept. 5 to 12 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Displayed at the venues of the lectures were photos documenting the undying exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and those introducing the DPRK.
					
					 The chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea noted that the DPRK has turned into a powerful socialist country under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association said the DPRK would be unthinkable without Kim Il Sung as he built the DPRK into an independent power adhering to the socialist idea and principles.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the lecture given in Finland.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test Supported in Kyrgyzstan, Uganda
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Warhead Explosion Test Supported in Kyrgyzstan, Uganda
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The "Aalam-Party of Non-Parties" of Kyrgyzstan and the Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement made public statements on Sept. 14 and 15 in support of the DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test which demonstrated the might of a nuclear power of Juche.
					 The "Aalam-Party of Non-Parties" of Kyrgyzstan said:
					
					 The news on the DPRK's nuclear warhead explosion test shook the whole world.
					
					 The test was a proof of the highly developed science and technology in the DPRK.
					
					 The world should recognize the strategic position of the DPRK as a full-fledged nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The U.S. should opt for dialogue with the DPRK.
					
					 The Ugandan National Executive Committee of the Pan-African Movement said:
					
					 Korea will be reunified as desired by the Korean people free from foreign interference.
					
					 The DPRK is successfully foiling the hostile acts of the imperialist allied forces and demonstrating its might.
					
					 We wish the Korean people greater success in the struggle to defend the sovereignty of the country.

articles.title: Film Shows Held in Different Countries to Mark DPRK's Founding Anniversary
articles.content:
Film Shows Held in Different Countries to Mark DPRK's Founding Anniversary
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- Korean film shows were held in Brazil, Malaysia, Thailand and Algeria from Sept. 6 to 9 on the 68th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Films shown included "Grand Celebration of 70th Founding Anniversary of Workers' Party of Korea in Presence of Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un".
					
					 The chairman of the Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il and other personages said that there are not the people like the Korean people who have been loyal to their leaders and that it is thanks to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who enforced policies for the people.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the Korean people will build a strong socialist country without fail, smashing the U.S. and its vassal forces' moves to stifle the DPRK, they said.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Backed by Venezuelan Personage
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Backed by Venezuelan Personage
Pyongyang, September 21 (KCNA) -- The executive secretary of the Venezuelan Committee for International Solidarity and Peace on Sept. 13 made public a statement supporting the just cause of the Korean people firmly defending the sovereignty of their country with powerful nuclear deterrence.
					 He said:
					
					 The prevailing situation, in which mankind is undergoing untold misery and suffering in every part of our planet owing to the U.S. terrorism, clearly shows that it is the right of a full-fledged sovereign state to safeguard the sovereignty of the country and the security of the people and achieve its development by its own efforts.
					
					 We extend sincere congratulations to the Korean people winning one victory after another in the just anti-imperialist struggle including their successful nuclear explosion test to assess the power of nuclear warheads, which exercised their rights.
					
					 The world's progressives should learn a lot from the Party, the service members and people of the DPRK reacting to nuclear threats of every description from the provocateurs, keeping to the socialist road under the banner of the Juche idea fathered by Kim Il Sung, eternal President of the DPRK.
					
					 We hope that the Korean people will register greater successes in the drive for accomplishing the 5-year strategy for national economic development in hearty response to the decisions of the historic 7th Congress of the Party at which Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of socialist Korea, was elected chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con jefes de Estado de varios paises
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con jefes de Estado de varios paises
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, Kim Yong Nam, quien toma parte en la XVII cumbre de los NOAL en calidad de jefe de la delegacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, se reunio durante esta reunion con los jefes de Estado de varios paises. 
					El dia 18, departio por separado con los presidentes de la Republica Bolivariana de Venezuela, del Consejo de Estado de la Republica de Cuba y de la Republica Islamica de Iran. 
					
					En esas ocasiones, Kim Yong Nam dijo que el pueblo coreano crea milagros e innovaciones en la lucha por materializar la resolucion del VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea con gran gloria y orgullo de haber elegido al Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Presidente del PTC y del Comite de Estado de la RPDC.
					
					La RPDC se vio obligada a poseer las armas nucleares debido a la creciente politica hostil de Estados Unidos y las fuerzas seguidoras, reitero y se refirio al caracter injusto de la sancion de las fuerzas hostiles. 
					
					Destaco la necesidad de promover mas el MNOAL y dar buen impulso al desarrollo de relaciones bilaterales entre los paises. 
					
					El mandatario venezolano dijo estar muy agradecido del Mariscal Kim Jong Un por prestar profunda atencion al desarrollo del MNOAL y enviar la delegacion de alto nivel a la cumbre. Prosiguio que su pais seguira intensificando el intercambio y contacto con la RPDC y desarrollando activamente las relaciones entre ambos paises.
					
					El presidente cubano dijo que le impresiono mucho la direccion en el terreno del companero Kim Jong Un sobre las labores de armamento nuclear y ejercicios de lanzamiento de cohetes. Aseguro que las relaciones de los dos paises se fortaleceran en el futuro tambien y formulo votos por la buena salud del lider coreano.
					
					El presidente irani senalo que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion, preparadas y consolidadas por los lideres antecesores de ambos paises, se profundizan positivamente bajo la atencion de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Un. Recalco que Iran no olvida nunca la ayuda sincera que brindo la RPDC en el periodo dificil y seguira desarrollando las relaciones bilaterales.
					
					Con anterioridad, Kim Yong Nam se reunio por separado con los presidentes de la Republica de Ecuador, el Estado Plurinacional de Bolivia, la Republica de Zimbabwe y el Estado de Palestina. 
					
					Los mandatarios manifestaron la voluntad de seguir ampliando en lo adelante tambien las relaciones bilaterales expresando el apoyo total y solidaridad a la justa causa del pueblo coreano que marcha con pasos firmes bajo la bandera de independencia antiimperialista y socialismo sin vacilar ante la presion e intervencion de los imperialistas. 
					
					Por otra parte, el jefe de la delegacion coreana converso por separado con el premier de Uganda, el vicepresidente de El Salvador, el vicepresidente de Nicaragua y el vicepremier y canciller de Vietnam.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Mali
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente de Mali
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 16 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Mali, Ibrahim Boubacar Keita, con motivo del 56o aniversario de la proclamacion de esta republica.
					Convencido de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran incesantemente las buenas relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises que tienen larga historia y tradicion, el remitente formulo votos por los exitos en los trabajos del destinatario y el pueblo malines por la paz, la estabilidad y el desarrollo socioeconomico del pais.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita dia nacional de Armenia
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita dia nacional de Armenia
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 21 un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Armenia, Serge Sarkissian, con motivo del dia nacional de este pais. 
					Convencido de que se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran las relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises, el remitente deseo al destinatario buena salud y mayores exitos en sus trabajos para el desarrollo y prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Instalada Embajada de la RPDC en Belarus
articles.content:
Instalada Embajada de la RPDC en Belarus
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 19 en Minsk la ceremonia de inauguracion de la Embajada de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en Belarus. 
					Fueron invitadas las personalidades del gobierno, partidos politicos, parlamento y circulo social del pais europeo. 
					
					Estuvieron presentes los funcionarios del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores y otras unidades coreanas que permanecen en el mismo pais. 
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos. 
					
					Un jefe de departamento del Ministerio de RR.EE. de Belarus dijo que la instalacion de la embajada coreana en su pais reviste una gran importancia en ampliar y desarrollar las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises que tienen larga tradicion, y expreso la conviccion de que los vinculos bilaterales se fortaleceran mas en todos los dominios. 
					
					Deseo que el pueblo coreano logre mayores exitos en el desarrollo socioeconomico del pais. 
					
					Se izo la bandera nacional de la RPDC en la Embajada.

articles.title: Jefe de departamento de MINREX visita Belarus
articles.content:
Jefe de departamento de MINREX visita Belarus
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ACNC) -- La delegacion de trabajo del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, encabezada por un jefe de departamento, realizo desde el dia 18 al 20 una visita a la Republica de Belarus cumplimentando la invitacion del MINREX de este pais. 
					En el periodo de la visita, la delegacion coreana sostuvo las negociaciones con un jefe de departamento del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de Belarus y participo en la ceremonia de apertura de la Embajada de la RPDC en ese pais europeo. 
					
					En las negociaciones ambas partes discutieron los asuntos de ampliar y desarrollar en varios dominios como la politica, la economia y la cultura las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises e intercambiaron las opiniones sobre los problemas regionales e internacionales de interes mutuo. 
					
					Reafirmaron la voluntad de llevar a una nueva etapa las relaciones de amistad de larga historia entre los dos paises de acuerdo con la demanda y los intereses de ambos pueblos, y acordaron desarrollar ininterrumpidamente las relaciones politicas incluso el intercambio entre los dos Ministerios de RR.EE. y ampliar mas la cooperacion economica bilateral. 
					
					La parte de Belarus estimo que el establecimiento de la embajada coreana en Minsk testimonia la aspiracion y voluntad del gobierno y pueblo coreanos de desarrollar en una nueva etapa elevada las relaciones entre los dos paises, mientras la parte coreana expreso agradecimiento al gobierno, el MINREX y otros organos correspondientes de Belarus que ofrecieron las asistencias y facilidades sinceras para la inauguracion de la embajada. 
					
					Ambas partes expresaron la voluntad de estrechar mas la cooperacion mutua en las escenas internacionales incluso la ONU basandose en el principio de la no intervencion en los asuntos internos, el respeto a la soberania, la igualdad y los beneficios mutuos.

articles.title: Emplazamiento de THAAD causara gran desastre nacional: comentario de ACNC
articles.content:
Emplazamiento de THAAD causara gran desastre nacional: comentario de ACNC
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Espantada por el colosal poder explosivo de la nueva ojiva nuclear de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, la banda titere surcoreana se mueve con mas desesperacion para desplegar el THAAD.
					La traidora Park Geun-hye dijo que "se ve obligada a emplazar sin falta el THAAD" describiendo la prueba de ojiva nuclear de la parte connacional como "circunstancia extremadamente grave del nivel de estado de emergencia nacional".
					
					Sus lacayos tambien disparatean que "se hizo mas necesario el emplazamiento de THAAD por la prueba nuclear del Norte de Corea" y "hay que introducir mas de una bateria" de ese sistema antimisiles.
					
					Con esta chismografia, los lacayos surcoreanos tratan de encubrir su identidad de traidores a la nacion que sin tomar en consideracion el destino nacional, materializan al frente la ambicion de su amo gringo de tomar la hegemonia mundial.
					
					Es estupida la intencion de ellos de protegerse con THAAD desde el ataque nuclear de la RPDC.
					
					Ese y otros sistemas de defensa antimisil de EE.UU. no pasan de ser un monton de chatarra como reconocio oficialmente en febrero de este ano la contraloria estadounidense que los califico de "defectuosos que no pueden defender a EE.UU.".
					
					Un experto norteamericano, quien investigo durante mas de 30 anos el sistema antimisiles, confeso que la tecnologia usada por el Norte de Corea en el proceso de lanzamiento de satelite de febrero pasado demostro que puede hacer inservible el THAAD.
					
					Sin embargo, Park Geun-hye y sus compinches actuan con frenesi depositando esperanza absoluta en el THAAD.
					
					El emplazamiento de ese sistema forma parte de las maniobras norteamericanas para dominar el mundo.
					
					Doblegar en lo militar a sus rivales potenciales de la region y tomar la hegemonia de Asia-Pacifico y el resto del mundo, he aqui la intencion verdadera de EE.UU.
					
					Por eso, los paises vecinos rechazan fuertemente el despliegue de THAAD en el suelo surcoreano advirtiendo sobre sus tragicas consecuencias.
					
					La traidora Park Geun-hye habla como si THAAD pudiera proteger a la poblacion surcoreana en el tiempo de emergencia. Por el contrario, el Sur de Corea se convertira en el primer blanco de ataque nuclear en el caso de que ese sistema fuera emplazado.
					
					Las perdidas seran mas grandes todavia si se toma en cuenta los gastos de operacion que pagaran las autoridades surcoreanas a su amo norteamericano.
					
					El emplazamiento de THAAD causara solo el gran desastre nacional.
					
					Para eludir la calamidad nuclear, la poblacion surcoreana debe eliminar sin demora a Park Geun-hye, vendepatria proyanqui.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana no debe perdonar jamas a la camarilla de Park Geun-hye.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica intento de Japon de dar por finalizado tema de esclavitud sexual
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica intento de Japon de dar por finalizado tema de esclavitud sexual
Pyongyang, 21 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En el reciente encuentro con Park Geun-hye, Abe le dijo que Japon cumple el "acuerdo sobre el problema de consoladoras sexuales" para el viejo ejercito japones y el Sur de Corea tambien debe hacerlo incluso en el tema de la estatua de una nina esclava sexual.
					Es decir, la parte surcoreana debe remover esa estatua situada frente a la embajada japonesa en el Sur de Corea porque Japon paga dinero a la "Fundacion de Apoyo" a las victimas de esclavitud sexual.
					
					Esto demuestra a que grado llegan el descaro y la bajeza moral de los reaccionarios japoneses que intentan zanjar con sumas miserables su tremendo crimen de haber convertido a 200 mil coreanas en esclavas sexuales para el ejercito japones.
					
					Asi denuncia el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					Ese problema no es el que se puede resolver enganando a la contraparte torpe.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben reconocer cuanto antes la responsabilidad legal y moral del Estado, pedir disculpas e indemnizar con sinceridad y tomar las medidas por recuperar el honor manchado de todas las victimas y prevenir la repeticion del caso.
					
					El derecho y costumbre internacionales exigen que un crimen estatal sea disculpado e indemnizado por el Estado correspondiente.
					
					El pais, que no cumple la responsabilidad y el deber moral estipulados por el derecho internacional, no podra ganarse nunca la confianza internacional.
					
					Estarian muy equivocados si los reaccionarios japoneses piensan que pueden liquidar sus tremendos crimenes antieticos como el de esclavitud sexual pagando sumas insignificantes a los imbeciles como la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye.
					
					Ellos deben dejar de actuar como negociantes mezquinos.
